exceptions.tactic: intros m E t1 T Hj Hred t2 Hred_red.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : nat) (E : env ty) (t1 : term) (T : ty), j m E t1 T -> forall t2 : term, red t1 t2 -> exists n : nat, j n E t2 T

Premises:
env = fun A : Type => list (option A) : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
Inductive j : nat -> env ty -> term -> ty -> Prop := JVar : forall (n : nat) (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> j n E (TVar x) T | JAbs : forall (m n : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j m (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> j n E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2) | JApp : forall (n m1 m2 : nat) (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j m1 E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j m2 E t2 T1 -> j n E (TApp t1 t2) T2 | JTyAbs : forall (n : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive red : term -> term -> Prop := RedBeta : forall t1 t2 : term, red (TApp (TAbs t1) t2) (subst t2 0 t1) | RedContextTAbs : forall t1 t2 : term, red t1 t2 -> red (TAbs t1) (TAbs t2) | RedContextTAppLeft : forall t1 t2 t : term, red t1 t2 -> red (TApp t1 t) (TApp t2 t) | RedContextTAppRight : forall t1 t2 t : term, red t1 t2 -> red (TApp t t1) (TApp t t2) Arguments RedContextTAbs [t1 t2] Arguments RedContextTAppLeft [t1 t2] Arguments RedContextTAppRight [t1 t2]
Inductive ty : Set := TyVar : nat -> ty | TyArrow : ty -> ty -> ty | TyForall : ty -> ty Arguments TyVar _%nat_scope
Inductive term : Set := TVar : nat -> term | TAbs : term -> term | TApp : term -> term -> term Arguments TVar _%nat_scope
j_ind : forall P : nat -> env ty -> term -> ty -> Prop, (forall (n : nat) (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> P n E (TVar x) T) -> (forall (m n : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j m (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P m (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> P n E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)) -> (forall (n m1 m2 : nat) (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j m1 E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> P m1 E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j m2 E t2 T1 -> P m2 E t2 T1 -> P n E (TApp t1 t2) T2) ->...-> P n e t t0

JApp : forall (n m1 m2 : nat) (E : env ty) (t1 t2 : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j m1 E t1 (TyArrow T1 T2) -> j m2 E t2 T1 -> j n E (TApp t1 t2) T2

JTyApp : forall (n m : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T U U' : ty), j m E t (TyForall T) -> m < n -> subst U 0 T = U' -> j n E t U'

JTyAbs : forall (n : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j n (map (shift 0) E) t T -> j n E t (TyForall T)
Unnamed_thm : forall (n : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j n E t (TyForall T) -> j (S n) (map (shift 0) E) t T
JAbs : forall (m n : nat) (E : env ty) (t : term) (T1 T2 : ty), j m (insert 0 T1 E) t T2 -> j n E (TAbs t) (TyArrow T1 T2)
JVar : forall (n : nat) (E : env ty) (x : nat) (T : ty), lookup x E = Some T -> j n E (TVar x) T

inversion_JTyAbs : forall (E : env ty) (t : term) (T : ty), j 0 E (TAbs t) (TyForall T) -> j 0 (map (shift 0) E) (TAbs t) T

TraverseVarInjective_term = {| traverse_var_injective := fun (f : nat -> nat -> nat) (H : forall x1 x2 l : nat, f l x1 = f l x2 -> x1 = x2) (t1 : term) => term_ind (fun t2 : term => forall (t3 : term) (l : nat), traverse_var f l t2 = traverse_var f l t3 -> t2 = t3) (fun (n : nat) (t2 : term) => match t2 as t return (forall l : nat, traverse_var f l (TVar n) = traverse_var f l t -> TVar n = t) with | TVar n0 => fun (l : nat) (h : TVar (f l n) = TVar (f l n0)) => let H0 : TVar (f l n0) = TVar (f l n0) -> TVar n = TVar n0 := match h in (_ = y) return (y = TVar (f l n0) -> TVar...
traverse_term = fix traverse_term (f : nat -> nat -> term) (l : nat) (t : term) {struct t} : term := match t with | TVar x => f l x | TAbs t0 => TAbs (traverse_term f (1 + l) t0) | TApp t1 t2 => TApp (traverse_term f l t1) (traverse_term f l t2) end : (nat -> nat -> term) -> nat -> term -> term Arguments traverse_term _%function_scope _%nat_scope

Subst_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Traverse V T) => {| subst := fun (v : V) (k : nat) (t : T) => traverse (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 v) (l + k) x) 0 t |} : forall V : Type, Var V -> Traverse V V -> forall T : Type, Traverse V T -> Subst V T Arguments Subst_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H H0} {T}%type_scope {H1}
Lift_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T) => {| lift := fun (w k : nat) (t : T) => traverse (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + k) x)) 0 t |} : forall V : Type, Var V -> forall T : Type, Traverse V T -> Lift T Arguments Lift_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0}
term_ind : forall P : term -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P (TVar n)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> P (TAbs t)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (TApp t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t
term_sind : forall P : term -> SProp, (forall n : nat, P (TVar n)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> P (TAbs t)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (TApp t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t
term_rect : forall P : term -> Type, (forall n : nat, P (TVar n)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> P (TAbs t)) -> (forall t : term, P t -> forall t0 : term, P t0 -> P (TApp t t0)) -> forall t : term, P t

``` 
intros m E t1 T Hj Hred t2 Hred_red.
inversion Hred; subst.
- exists m. apply Hj.
- inversion Hj; subst.
  + exists n. apply Hred_red.
  + exists m0. apply JApp with (m1:=m1) (m2:=m2); assumption.
  + exists m0. apply JTyAbs with (m:=m); assumption.
```

original: intros m E t1 T Hj Hred t2 Hred_red. inversion Hred; subst. - exists m. apply Hj. - inversion Hj; subst. + exists n. apply Hred_red. + exists m0. apply JApp with (m1:=m1) (m2:=m2); auto. + exists m0. apply JTyAbs with (m:=m); auto.
